original_title: Puttalam Quazi Court Judge arrested on bribery charge
original_body_lines: The Puttalam Quazi Court Judge has been arrested by Bribery Commission officers while allegedly soliciting a bribe of Rs. 5,000.
He has been remanded until 06 May after being produced before the Puttalam Magistrate’s Court, the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption (CIABOC) said.
